name: Colour Break (AVandersloot)
description: You are a covert agent who was sent into a top secret facility owned by a large but seedy mega-corporation to gather information about a new, potentially revolutionary, multi-coloured, artificial resource and whether or not it would be used for malicious purposes.  Midway through your investigation, you were discovered, and now must escape with the facility on high alert.  Using your unique ability to absorb and blend colour, and abusing the corporation’s tendency for haphazard working conditions, sneak and stun your way through in order to escape to the outside world.
